scripts.build: npm run export && docker compose build $npm_config_services
scripts.build-force: npm run config-to-prod && npm run export && npm run prerun && docker compose build --no-cache $npm_config_services
scripts.build-llm: npm run prerun && npm run export && docker compose -f docker-compose.llm.yml build $npm_config_services
scripts.config-to-test: node ./Scripts/Install/ReplaceValueInConfig.js ENVIRONMENT test && node ./Scripts/Install/ReplaceValueInConfig.js APP_TAG test
scripts.deploy-prod: kubectl config use-context oneuptime-prod && helm upgrade oneuptime ./HelmChart/Public/oneuptime -f ./HelmChart/Public/oneuptime/values.yaml  -f ./HelmChart/Values/prod.values.yaml
scripts.deploy-test: kubectl config use-context oneuptime-test && helm upgrade oneuptime ./HelmChart/Public/oneuptime -f ./HelmChart/Public/oneuptime/values.yaml  -f ./HelmChart/Values/test.values.yaml
scripts.dev: npm run config-to-dev && npm run prerun && npm run export && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up --remove-orphans -d $npm_config_services
scripts.dev-llm: npm run prerun && npm run export && docker compose -f docker-compose.llm.yml up --remove-orphans -d $npm_config_services
scripts.exec: npm run export && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml exec -it
scripts.force-build-llm: npm run prerun && npm run export && docker compose -f docker-compose.llm.yml build  --no-cache $npm_config_services
scripts.generate-postgres-migration: npm run export && node --require ts-node/register ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:generate ./Common/Server/Infrastructure/Postgres/SchemaMigrations/MigrationName -d ./Common/Server/Infrastructure/Postgres/LocalMigrationGenerationDataSource.ts
scripts.logs: npm run export && docker compose logs --tail=100 -f $npm_config_services
scripts.prod: npm run config-to-prod && npm run export && npm run prerun && docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up --remove-orphans -d $npm_config_services && npm run status-check
scripts.ps: npm run export &&  docker compose ps
scripts.pull: npm run export && docker compose -f docker-compose.build.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml pull
scripts.release: npm run bump-version && npm run config-to-prod && npm run export && npm run prerun && docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml build --no-cache $npm_config_services
scripts.release-preview: npm run export && npm run prerun && docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml build $npm_config_services
scripts.remove-all-containers: docker stop $(docker ps -a -q) && docker rm $(docker ps -a -q) || echo 'No running containers'
scripts.run-probes: npm run export && docker compose up --remove-orphans -d probe-1 probe-2
scripts.save-logs: npm run export && docker compose logs --tail=100000 $npm_config_services > logs.txt
scripts.start: npm run export && docker compose up --remove-orphans -d $npm_config_services && npm run status-check
scripts.start-llm: npm run prerun && npm run export && docker compose -f docker-compose.llm.yml up --remove-orphans -d $npm_config_services
scripts.stop: npm run export && docker compose down --remove-orphans
scripts.template-deploy-test: kubectl config use-context oneuptime-test && helm template  oneuptime ./HelmChart/Public/oneuptime -f ./HelmChart/Public/oneuptime/values.yaml  -f ./HelmChart/Values/test.values.yaml --debug
scripts.update: npm run prerun && npm run export && docker compose pull && npm run start
scripts.write-logs: npm run export && docker compose logs -f $npm_config_services > logs.txt
